S = input()
T = input()

count = 0

for i in range(3):
    if S[i] == T[i]:
        count += 1

print(count)

# Get input
forecast = input()
actual = input()

# Count number of days forecast was correct
correct = 0
for i in range(3):
    if forecast[i] == actual[i]:
        correct += 1

# Print number of days forecast was correct
print(correct)

T = input()
